titleStmt.title: Remarques on the humours and conversations of the town written in a letter to Sr. T.L.
titleStmt.author: S. L.

notesStmt.note: Assigned by Wing to "S.L.", with Wing number L64, in first ed.; number changed in Wing (2nd ed.) to R932B.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Contrasting the merits of rural life with the vices of the city.
